column5: It would seem you take a great picture from either side of the camera Brandon. Nice fish.
Nice Ski Brandon congratz I bet it was a little chilly out there today so its not like you did not work for her.
Very Nice!!!!
Great muskie, WTG. Bet you'll have the muskie bug now
I think we have another convert here. Remember, when you fish for musky, everything else is just bait!!
awesome fish, great colours too
Thanks guys!...and yes, I'm definitely hooked now!
Congrats brandon on your first    Awesome soft water shark Thanks for sharing!!! Leechman

I know a lot of you guys keep bugging me about only posting photography reports and never fishing reports....well today, I went fishing.  A guy by the name of Jon Bondy lives in my apartment building, and if any of you fish the Detroit River or St. Clair, chances are you've heard of his bait...The Bondy Bait.  Anyways Jon Invited me out for some Muskie fishing this morning on the river.  I've never fished for muskie before and the only one I've ever caught was about 18" long while Bass fishing...so it doesn't really count.  Jon fishes the river almost daily so I was quite confident he could put me on a fish.  We were on the water at 630 and it was a very slow start...in fact so slow, that this fish was caught on our LAST pass before heading in around 1230pm.  Alright enough typing, here's the pic...oh and I don't want to get in trouble for posting links but if you guys are interested in fishing with Jon or checking out his bait, feel free to google....  48" November Muskie   November Muskie! by bbroderick86, on Flickr
Sweet fish...way to start out your musky adventures on a big note!  Here's the link.. http://www.bondybaitcompany.com/
Right On!!!!!!  that is a pig!!!! congrats!!!
Nice fish Brandon!
That's a great way to start off musky fishing.   Congrats on your first
Nice fatty!!
Nice fish Brandon. Ive trolled right by that spot many times
What a way to start.. now you're HOOKED !
That is so cool Brandon. Congrats..
Awesome fish, it takes alot of people alot of time to catch a fish like that, so well done!
Congrats Brandon on your first of many.
Congrats Brandon.  Nice big head on her and nice markings.  Way to go  Joey
She's gorgious!!!
Nice Ski !!!!cant wait to post my first. Maybe Santa will bring me some muskie gear for christmas.
Great Stuff Brandon....congrats!!!
Haha, great job brandon! glad to see another report from you bud.  thanks for sharing, mtbd

Very nice!!!  Got my first one this past summer, and, it was one of my highlights of this past year. Way to go, Brandon. Don't worry about lack of fishing reports, keep those "beauty" photos coming!!!
Wait a sec.....you fish???     Way to go....that's a seriously nice fish
Like the spots on the muskies over there. Great first fish, obviously your guide knew his stuff.
Wow congratz Brandon on your 1st muskie!!!! What a beauty she is
way to go Brandon!!!  48" is a great musky, 1st or 100th!!
Wow...incredible 1st!
Great fish. You didn't describe the hit. Usually with the bondy bait the hits are violent.

Unfortunately I didn't get to experience one of the violent hits that often occurs with the Bondy Bait.  In my case the line just went slack on the drop...and man what a feeling setting the hook into such a fish!!
